value:
I've come so far since my time at the
royal villa thanks to my lord Ike and
the others.

I'm the daughter of Ramon, king of
Crimea. People may call me a
princess, but...$k$pAh, no, it's nothing... Forgive me.

I suspect our journeys have left you
worn out. When that happens, be
sure to make it known.$k$pYou can rely on us as we rely on you.

I'm quite good at cooking and other
household chores, I'll have you know.$k$pHm? That doesn't seem very
princess-like to you? Haha! You're
not the first one to say so.

You may be surprised to learn I'm a
skilled pegasus rider. My pegasus
belonged to my great-grandmother.

My name is Elincia. Might you be
$Nu?$k$pI've come at the request of
$Nf.

I'll do my very best to rise to meet
everyone else.

I'm doing my best to learn what I
can, little by little.

I'm sorry if I couldn't quite live up
to your expectations.

Thanks for granting me this gift.
From the bottom of my heart.

My name is Elincia Ridell Crimea,
daughter of King Ramon of Crimea.
Pleased to make your acquaintance.

I spent most of my life living at the
mercy of circumstance. I was never
able to relieve my own uneasiness.$k$pHowever, traveling with my lord Ike
and the others, and spending time
here...$k$pIt's allowed me to see a clearer
picture of what it is I need to do.$k$pMy power alone is not enough to
accomplish anything. However, if my
rising up will help other people...$k$pIf it will help even a little, then that is
the path I choose for myself. I no
longer have doubt about that.
えいっ！
My apologies...
きゃああっ！
I'm slowing everyone down...
A thrashing for you!
You mustn't!
We will fight if we must!
Truly sorry!
My friends...
Heehee
My full name is Elincia Ridell Crimea, and I am the daughter of King Ramon of Crimea.
Oh! I'm...I'm sorry. I ought to stay on guard for any sort of surprise attack.
Could I perhaps ask for your help in practicing for battle? I must do my fair share out there.
I will be forever grateful to my lord Ike and the other mercenaries.
Would you mind if I stayed here longer? I won't be a bother.
Ah, Crimea. Land of my birth, land that made me...who I am today.
I believe in you. No matter what may come.
Of course.
Always.
Off I go.
